name.title: Tech Lead / Staff Engineer with more than 20 years of experience

buzzwords.name: Python, Java, PHP, Scala, whatever…
buzzwords.text: Doesn't matter – just write tests for it!

buzzwords.name: Typescript/Javascript, SvelteKit, Next.js, React, Node.
buzzwords.text: We still love you, jQuery! But we love Svelte more...

buzzwords.name: CSS, Tailwind, and even Boostrap.
buzzwords.text: Tailwind seems to be eating the world, but I do love me some artisinally crafted CSS.

buzzwords.name: REST APIs, Web Services, Cloud Functions, GraphQL.
buzzwords.text: Y’know, all that modern web jazz that’s making a buzz on the interwebs.

buzzwords.name: Project Management, Growing Engineers.
buzzwords.text: Project/Tech specs, planning, mentoring, watering the EICs.

buzzwords.name: I18n, L10n, A11y.
buzzwords.text: I’ve learned more than I ever thought I wanted to know about character sets, locales, and externalization.

buzzwords.name: PDF Generation & Printing.
buzzwords.text: Taking HTML to Print/PDF and building PDFs from PDF templates.

buzzwords.name: Version Control, Command Line Scripting, Automation & CI.
buzzwords.text: Building seamless development and deployment pipelines that make developers happier.

buzzwords.name: Mac & Linux.
buzzwords.text: Windows use is for family tech support and cross-browser testing only.

buzzwords.name: WordPress Contributor.
buzzwords.text: Mostly bug fixes and small enhancements to the WP Core, but its all for the greater good, right?

objective: I'm a full-stack software engineer experienced in building scalable web applications and leading cross-functional teams. I thrive in both individual and team settings, delivering solutions that combine technical excellence with user-centric design. My expertise spans distributed systems, modern JavaScript frameworks, and back-end development.

positions.title: Lead Developer / Co-owner
description: Build an engaging online trivia game using Svelte, Supabase, and custom CSS, minimizing node modules to create a lightweight application that works well on both desktop and mobile devices.
Generate in-depth statistics suitable for user rankings, comparisons, and automated league categorization.
Conduct user behavior analysis and customer interviews to identify feature opportunities and improve engagement.

positions.title: Software Engineer, Contractor
description: Develop custom web application supporting thousands of daily users using Next.js & Golang.
Develop custom WordPress sites using Bootstrap and Tailwind, enhancing functionality through custom code and with plugins like Advanced Custom Fields.
Collaborate with clients to break down requirements and plan development work, focusing on mobile responsiveness and accessibility.
Automate workflows for CI/CD pipelines across WPEngine and customer hosted environments.

positions.title: Lead Software Engineer
description: Led a team focused on customer and product growth to implement new features in Python and React/TypeScript, working closely with Product, Sales, and Support teams to meet customer and product needs.
Enabled customers to create complex dynamic pricing models based on custom properties attached to product SKUs.
Supervised remote contractors in finalizing an internal Design System, ensuring consistent code quality and design patterns.
Improved application performance by reducing build size through browser analysis and package optimization.

positions.title: Staff Software Engineer / Tech Lead, Growth Engineering
description: Developed scalable, fault-tolerant systems that supported multiple teams in onboarding new members and accelerating product adoption through innovative application designs and effective cross-team collaboration.
Mentored engineers on project and task management, engineering best practices, problem-solving, and code quality.
Oversaw remote contractors and streamlined team productivity by clarifying expectations and task definitions.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer 1 & 2
description: Contributed to various teams, including Growth Engineering, Experimentation Platform, Phone Numbers, and Console.
Enabled teams to make run-time decisions about their customers based on live data and computed metrics through a custom built customer data platform integrated in to the experimentation platform.
Enabled company compliance with international phone number regulations though a patented workflow system to provision phone numbers in compliance with worldwide, country specific rules.

Enabled individual teams to support their own development lifecycles, decrease contention over core sections of the codebase, and to adopt and grow their back-end services per their own needs by deconstructing a monolithic PHP code base.
Drove a culture of testing as a normal part of the development lifecycle Increased adoption of technologies and tooling to improve system observability and drive down recovery time from errors.

patents.title: Multi-Jurisdictional Endpoint Allocation Compliance
description: A system for evaluating and verifying jurisdictional eligibility to allocate resources based on identification data and regulatory rule sets.

positions.title: Senior Developer
description: Developed custom solutions for building on and extending WordPress as a publishing platform.
Developed project requirements and plans for projects ranging from plugin development to API integrations to large-scale deployments
Developed systems built on top of CodeIgniter that take advantage of Amazon cloud services to scale to meet the demands of high-volume, time-sensitive data processing.

positions.title: Web Developer & Designer
description: Maintained the client-facing website and client portal for a hardware, software, and technical services distributor. Built a custom framework for managing product information, client portal access, and educational class schedules. Provided the marketing team with tools to help efficiently develop client communications.

education.institution: University of Northern Colorado, Greeley, Colorado
